content.text:
[@Matt Lorentz](@kS1GT34Sg+Kzjcqoehz//afmIQC5+CGo8O/KvMddVrM=.ed25519) 

I wish I'd seen your original post!

I've got the ErgoDox EZ as well and I think I adjusted within a few weeks as well. I spent a bunch of time on [keybr](https://www.keybr.com/) the first week or so and that helped a bunch, but since I'm still using the default firmware I have to have a print-out on my desk to remind myself of the characters in the code layer.

I'd love to hear if you try out other keyboard layouts (Dvorak, Colemak, DIY, etc)!
